special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet,with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The bullywug is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The bullywug has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, produce flame
1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, goodberry, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): call lightning, conjure animals (amphibians only)

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet,with or without a running start.

actions.desc: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands

name: Rat Queen
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (rat form only), passive Perception 12

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The Rat King is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The Rat King has the following druid spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, produce flame
1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, goodberry, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, spike growth
3rd level (2 slots): call lightning, conjure animals (Rats Only)

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only).
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

special_abilities.name: Gruumsh's Fury
special_abilities.desc: The ore deals an extra 4 (ld8) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ore makes two attacks with its greataxe or its spear.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d12 + 4 + d8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20{60 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (1d6 + 4 plus 1d8) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack

actions.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
actions.desc: Each creature of the war chief's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the war chief's next turn. The war chief can then make one attack as a bonus action.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (Sd8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Martial Advantage
special_abilities.desc: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 14 (4d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Multiattack
special_abilities.desc: The hobgoblin makes three melee attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft . or range 30/ 120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the hobgoblin can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostil e creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the goblin. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the hobgoblin is incapacitated.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (Sd8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Multiattack
special_abilities.desc: The orc makes two greataxe attacks

special_abilities.name: Aggressive
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Javelin

special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tower Ballista
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120/600 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d10 + 1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The hobgoblin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the hobgoblin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Confusing Gaze.
special_abilities.desc: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated. On a fai led saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a '1 or 8, the  creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it doe.s nothing if no creature is within reach. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

name: Grick Alpha
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The grick makes two attacks: one with its tail and one with its tentacles. If it hits with its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) slashing damage

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

name: Cambion
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from non magical weapons
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (rat form only), passive Perception 14

special_abilities.name: Fiendish Blessing
special_abilities.desc: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The cambion's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: 3/day each: alter self, command, detect magic 1/day: plane shift (self only)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

actions.name: Whip
actions.desc: Melee, one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage, plus 6 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 120ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Charm
actions.desc: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

name: Banshee
damage_resistances: acid, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from non magical weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

special_abilities.name: Detect Life
special_abilities.desc: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The banshee can move through 0ther creatures and objects as if they were difficu lt terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends he~ turn inside an object.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.desc: Each non-undead creatu re within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a ta rget's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.desc: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: When teh monk subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry
special_abilities.desc: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights
1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Monk makes two attacks with it's monk weapons and one unarmed strike as a bonus action

actions.name: Monk Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Strike (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of your next turn.

actions.name: Spider Shuriken
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

name: Shadow Demon
damage_resistances: acid, fire, necrotic, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, para lyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Light Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in bright lig ht, the demon has disadvantage on attack roll s, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Shadow Stealth
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll , 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

name: Helmed Horror
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
senses: blind sight 60ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can 't speak

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The helm ed horror has advantage on saving throws aga inst spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spell Immunity
special_abilities.desc: The helmed horror is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include fireball, heat metal, and lightning bolt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The helmed horror makes two longsword attacks

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

name: Beholder Zombie
languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 +the damage taken, un less the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point in stead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray.
actions.desc:
1. Paralyzing Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. 
2. Fear Ray. The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success . 
3. Enervation Ray. The targeted creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. 
4. Disintegration Ray. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 (10d8) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust. If the target is a Large or smal ler non magical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger non magical object or creation of magical force , this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
5th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The following paladin spells are prepared:

1st level (4 slots): hellish rebuke, inflict wounds, shield of faith, wrathful smite

2nd level (2 slots): aid, crown of madness, darkness, magic weapon

special_abilities.name: Hellish smite
special_abilities.desc: Use a spell slot for + 2d8 element damage

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Paladin makes two Greatsword attacks or two heavy crossbow attacks.

actions.name: Mounted Lance Charge
actions.desc: If mounted and move at least 20 feet.  Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, DC 16 Strenght save of fall prone.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target, Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Tiamat Cultist is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The cult leader has the following cleric spells prepared:

cantrips (at will): guidance, light, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, identify, guiding bolt

2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, silence, spiritual weapon

3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, mass healing word, spirit guardians

4th level (3 slots): banishment, death ward, guardian of faith

5th level (2 slots): flame strike

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Tiamat Cultist makes one melee attack and casts a cantrip.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spiritul Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Dragon's Rebuke
reactions.desc: As a reaction when struck by a melee attack, the Tiamat Cultist can expend a spell slot to do 10 (3d6) necrotic damage to the attacker. If the emerald order cult leader expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Steaming Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts it's turn within 5 feet Ezrial takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ezraial makes three attacks, choosing Scimitar, Fire Bolt Eyes, or Grab

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 2d8 fire damage

actions.name: Fire Bolt Eyes
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +14 to hit, one target. Hit: 30 (4d10) fire damage

actions.name: Grab Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage. On hit the target is grappled (escape DC 18) and lifted 10' in the air.

actions.name: Ground throw
actions.desc: Ezrail tosses a grappled creature to the ground, 4d8 falling damage and creature is prone. Takes place of a grab strike

legendary_actions.name: Grab strike
legendary_actions.desc: Ezrail can make a Grab Strike

legendary_actions.name: Fire Eyes
legendary_actions.desc: Ezrail can make a Fire Bolt Eyes atttack

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke
reactions.desc: DC 18 dex save or 2d10 fire or half
